strategies.name: RSI + SMA Crossover
strategies.description: Uses RSI for overbought/oversold and SMA crossover for trend confirmation

strategies.name: Volatility Breakout (Bollinger Bands)
strategies.description: Bollinger Band breakout strategy - buy on lower band touch, sell on upper band touch

strategies.name: Momentum Trend Following (MACD-style)
strategies.description: MACD-style momentum strategy with EMA crossovers and histogram analysis

notes: Strategy ID must match Executor.sol strategyId parameter
Backend selects strategy based on config or market conditions
Multiple strategies can be enabled simultaneously for comparison
